name: Accountant (m/f/d) part-time
description:
As a member of our team, you will represent the financial perspective of the Portuguese Team and be the contact person for the Headquarter Finance Team in Hamburg, Germany. The vacancy is set for 20hrs/week.

Your main responsibilities and tasks will be:
  • Manage and control daily accounting operations (purchasing, sales, banking, taxes, stock movements, travel
  • Expenses, intercompany processes, and archiving)
  • Prepare of monthly reporting packages for the Group
  • Creating financial transparency for Country Manager
  • Supporting the Forecasting and Budgeting process from Financial standpoint
  • Use and further enhance of our locally used Finance system Business Central
  • Staying in contact suppliers and customers
  • Support the preparation for annual financial statements
  • Prepare VAT / CIT/ payroll taxes declarations
  • Be contact person for the tax authorization
To qualify for this position, you have a minimum of 5 years of work experience as well as a relevant
college or university degree

  • You have excellent MS Office skills (pivot table level) and you have a thorough knowledge of
  • accounting and accounting systems
  • Business Central practice is required.
  • You are fluent in Portuguese and English
  • Furthermore, you are able to interact with several different stakeholders and work in an fast-driven,
  • globally acting, but also locally based Group.
  • As a person, you are working accurately, are able to prioritize your work and meet deadlines.
  • You should be able to work independently.
  • You understand and love the role of the finance person which tries to bring in transparency for the
  • local management as well as the Headquarter.
  • In addition, you fit in a down-to-earth work environment and have good communication skills.
  • Open corporate culture: Immerse yourself in an international working environment where ideas and diversity are encouraged.
  • Collegial working atmosphere: Enjoy a working atmosphere characterised by collaboration and a hands-on mentality
  • Meal allowance through vouchers/card
  • Company health insurance plan
  • Continuous professional development and training with career growth opportunities
  • Flexible working hours and home office days
  • Relaxed atmosphere, steady, supportive international team

name: Medior Tester
description:
Are you an experienced Lead software tester, ready to take the next step in your career?

You like exciting projects and working as a core member of an international team?

Are you interested in the telecommunications industry?

As a member of our team you will participate in manual and automated testing, validating, specifying and documenting of the IT and telecommunication systems produced and operated by our company. You will take an active part in test planning, test case development and test group leading. You will work close with other team members: software developers, product owners, IT professionals and external partners.

Major responsibilities and tasks

  • Managing the design, implementation and execution of functional and non functional tests.
  • Support Integration and Regression testing.
  • Maintain test environments and participate in CI/CD related activities.
  • Executing the manual & automated tests in the short term, and automate the manual tests in the medium term.
  • Analyzing test results on database impacts, errors or bugs, and usability.
  • Preparing test documentation.
  • Validating specifications and setup guides.
  • Taking active part in test planning, test case development. 
  • Working closely with other team members: architects, product owners, software developers, IT and external partners.

Required qualifications and skills

  • at least 3-5 year experience as a software tester
  • experience in non-functional testing (Performance, Security)
  • strong experience in troubleshooting 
  • strong knowledge and experience in automated testing (not only UI Automation but API as well)
  • strong analytical, engineering, and technology skills that include practical application, techniques, and principles
  • knowledge of test methods 
  • high level expertise in using test management software
  • independent problem-solving skills and product focused way of thinking 
  • good command of English

 

Required:

  • Microsoft technologies (Windows infrastructure, IIS)
  • Database basics (SQL/MSSQL)
  • API Testing Tool (e.g.: Postman, SoapUI) 
  • Manual testing

Advantage:
  • BSc, MSc or higher level in Computer Science
  • Telco experience
  • Programming basics (C#/.NET)
  • Atlassian JIRA/Confluence
  • Robotframework
  • Linux knowledge
  • VOIP
  • ISTQB certification (any level)
  • Non-Functional Testing tool (e.g.: JMeter)
  • Experience in mobile application testing



We are offering

  • professional challenges, inspiring, diverse tasks
  • structured development process
  • learning path on new technologies (AI, LLM)
  • multiculture environment
  • flexible working hours and home office days
  • relaxed atmosphere, steady, supportive international team
  • easily accessible modern office with good infrastructure
  • complimentary coffee, fruits and snacks

name: Mobile Development Team Lead
description:
Are you an enthusiastic Mobile Development Team Lead ready to take the next step in your career?

You like exciting projects, using new development technologies? 

Are you interested in the telecommunications industry?

Here you will work close with other team members: software developers, test engineers, product owners, IT professionals and external partners.


Responsibilities


  • Mobile App Development: Design, build, and maintain advanced applications for the Android platform using Kotlin, Java (for Android).
  • User Interface Design: Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement appealing and user-friendly interfaces while ensuring a seamless user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
  • API Integration: Integrate RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and services to fetch data, authenticate users, and enable various functionalities within the mobile applications.
  • Code Optimization and Performance: Optimize application performance, including speed, memory usage, and battery consumption, to ensure smooth and efficient operation on various devices.
  • Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing of applications to identify and fix bugs, performance issues, and security vulnerabilities. Perform debugging and troubleshooting to resolve issues promptly.
  • Version Control: Utilize version control systems like Git to manage source code, track changes, and collaborate effectively with team members.
  • Documentation: Document codebase, APIs, and development processes to facilitate seamless collaboration, knowledge sharing, and future maintenance.
  • Platform-Specific Guidelines: Stay updated with platform-specific guidelines, best practices, and new features introduced by Google, ensuring compliance and leveraging the latest capabilities.
  • Leadership and Team management: 
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers and Development team members.
  • Assign tasks, manage workloads, and ensure that team members adhere to developing standards and processes.
  • Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, encouraging continuous learning and improvement.
  • Collaborate with testers, product owners, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and clarify expectations.
  • Participate in project meetings, providing insights and updates on development progress and issues.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in development tools, methodologies, and technologies.
  • Conduct regular reviews and retrospectives to assess the effectiveness of development efforts and make necessary adjustments

Required qualifications and skills

  • 5+ years working in UI development, with at least 2-3 years in a lead role
  • Proven experience in mobile app development for Android, with a strong portfolio showcasing relevant projects.
  • Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and experience with UI frameworks such as Material Design (Android).
  • Skills interacting with multiple types of API formats, preferably REST and GraphQL, but additional skills with Websockets, SSE, RPC would be desired.
  • Work with designers and other partners to provide input on design & wireframing.
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends and emerging technologies.
  • Familiar with publish the application on Google Store
  • Experience with Agile development methodologies.
  • Strong interpersonal and organizational skills.
  • Leadership and team management skills.
  • Independent problem-solving skills and product focused way of thinking.
  • Good command of English.

Advantage:

  • Cross-Platform Development: Utilize frameworks like React, Flutter, or .NET MAUI for cross-platform development, ensuring code reusability and efficiency.
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Engineering, Physics, Math, or related work experience.
  • Experience with UI design principles.
  • Experience in mobile application architecture design.

We are offering

  • professional challenges, inspiring, diverse tasks
  • structured development process
  • learning path on new technologies (AI, LLM)
  • multiculture environment
  • flexible working hours and home office days
  • relaxed atmosphere, steady, supportive international team
  • easily accessible modern office with good infrastructure
  • complimentary coffee, fruits and snacks

name: Project Manager (m/f/d)
description:
• Lead cross-functional project teams through all phases of project delivery (initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, closure)
  • Coordinate deployment of telecom and multimedia technologies (e.g., inmate communication platforms, secure mobile devices, video visitation, digital content systems)
  • Collaborate with internal teams (engineering, product, legal) and external partners/vendors to meet technical and regulatory requirements
  • Manage budgets, timelines, and risk across multiple concurrent projects
  • Support the creation and refinement of project documentation, technical specifications, and handover materials
  • Conduct regular stakeholder reporting, including status updates, escalations, and resource planning
  • Ensure all solutions meet required compliance standards, including data protection, security protocols, and operational integrity
  • On-site visits and technical assessment of the implemented measures
  • Proactive communication with customers and execution of workshops and meetings
  • Supporting national and international tenders

  • A successfully completed (technical) university degree or a successfully completed commercial apprenticeship
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience in project management, ideally within regulated or security- sensitive sectors (e.g., corrections, defence, healthcare, finance)
  • Strong knowledge of IT environments, including: network infrastructure, telecommunications systems, mobile device management, multimedia platforms (e.g., video, audio, content distribution)
  • Proven ability to work as a team player across multicultural and cross-functional environments
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal
  • Proactive, solution-oriented mindset with the ability to adapt quickly in dynamic environments
  • High self-initiative, autonomy, and resilience under pressure
  • Excellent time management, organizational skills, and attention to detail
  • Fluency in German (minimum upper intermediate B2) and English (written and spoken) is required
  • Additional languages such as French, Hungarian, or Dutch are a plus
  • Willingness to travel internationally and work flexibly across time zones

  • Modern, centrally located office: Just a 5-minute walk from Bahrenfeld station - easy access guaranteed!
  • Open corporate culture: Immerse yourself in an international working environment where ideas and diversity are encouraged.
  • Collegial working atmosphere: Enjoy a working atmosphere characterized by collaboration and a hands-on mentality
  • Hybrid working model: Flexibility - combine on-site and home office work.
  • 30 days holiday: More time for relaxation and leisure. Additional days off on 24 December, 31 December and half a day on your birthday.
  • Attractive remuneration package: We reward your performance appropriately.
  • Sodexo vouchers: For carefree catering while you work.
  • HVV season ticket or underground car park subsidy: Support for your convenient journey.
  • JobRad: Take advantage of the opportunity to lease a JobRad after your probationary period.
  • Company pension scheme: With a generous 25% employer contribution of up to €75.

name: Senior C# Developer
description:
Are you passionate about writing clean, high-quality code and building reliable software solutions? We are looking for a Senior C# Developer to join our growing development team in Budapest, working for a multinational leader in the telecommunications sector. In this role, you’ll contribute to cutting-edge projects that power secure and efficient communication systems across the ​Globe.

Duties and responsibilities

  • contribute to the continuous development, planning, documenting and testing of the IT systems developed and operated by the company 
  • plan and code main modules independently
  • cooperate in the software and database architecture planning
  • support the decision making processes by data base analysis 
  • participate in the research of new technologies related to the system, present ideas for system improvements
  • work closely with other colleagues of our DevOps team
  • based on your experience, you might also have the possibility to take part in the planning, development of the API, Library that supports our business software

Required qualifications and skills 

  • college or university degree
  • minimum of 5-years experience as a software developer 
  • high level expertise in C#, .NET Core and Entity Framework Core
  • solid grasp of designing and implementing relational databases using MS SQL Server
  • background in building web-based solutions, particularly with ASP.NET MVC
  • strong knowledge of REST (ASP.NET Web API) and SOAP (WCF)
  • ability to work autonomously and troubleshoot technical issues effectively
  • hands-on experience with Git version control system
  • proficient in English for both verbal and written technical communication
Advantages 
  • experience in microservice architecture design
  • knowledge of VoIP technologies (SIP, RTP)
  • experience in DevOps or continuous delivery approach

We are offering 

  • Professional challenges, inspiring, diverse tasks
  • structured development process
  • learning path on new technologies (AI, LLM)
  • multiculture environment
  • flexible working hours and home office days
  • relaxed atmosphere, steady, supportive international team
  • easily accessible modern office with good infrastructure
  • complimentary coffee, fruit and snacks

name: Senior Network Engineer
description:
• Network Installation and Support: Install, configure, and support network environments using technologies such as Extreme Networks, Cisco, and Fortinet, ensuring optimal performance, security, and reliability.
  • Firewall Management: Install, configure, and provide ongoing support for firewalls, including Fortigate and Cisco, ensuring the protection of network infrastructure from threats and unauthorized access.
  • Design and Administration: Design, implement, and administer customer network environments, tailoring solutions to meet specific client needs and ensuring high availability, performance, and resilience.
  • Second-Level IT Support: Act as 2nd Level IT Support for local field services, providing expert assistance, troubleshooting complex network issues, and maintaining seamless operations.
  • Network Monitoring and Administration: Monitor and administer local network environments, proactively identifying potential issues, optimizing performance, and ensuring secure network operations.
  • Incident Management: Efficiently manage, document, and resolve incidents using the Jira ticketing system, ensuring accurate tracking, timely resolution, and communication of network-related issues.
  • Network Optimization and Upgrades: Continuously assess network performance and implement upgrades or optimization strategies, including firmware updates, hardware replacements, and software patches.
  • Documentation and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive documentation of network configurations, changes, and procedures, and generate regular reports on network performance, incidents, and improvements.
  • Disaster Recovery Planning: Develop and maintain disaster recovery plans for network infrastructure, ensuring that backup and recovery procedures are tested and effective in restoring services after a failure.
  • Network Audit and Compliance Checks: Conduct regular network audits to ensure compliance with internal and external regulations, identifying areas for improvement and implementing necessary changes.
  •  Act as a liaison between Telio's Information Systems Security (ISS) team and the French client's ISS team, which operates in strategic markets
  • International Team Collaboration: Collaborate with an international IT team, contributing to cross-border projects and ensuring cohesive network management and support across global operations.
  • Standby Participation: Participate in standby duties
  • Certifications for Network devices like CISCO-CCNA, Fortinet or Extreme Certified Associate
  • More than 5 years of experience as network engineer
  • More than 3 years of experience in an international team as network engineer
  • Experiences in administration of phone systems. (Not required but advantageous)
  • Good knowledge central managed network systems and environment
  • Technical documentation skills
  • Fluent in French and proficient English skills, both spoken and written.
  • Ability to travel internationally (10% - 20%)

 

  • The opportunity to work in a dynamic and evolving environnement
  • Opportunities for professional development and growth
  • Professional challenges, stimulating and diverse tasks
  • Multicultural environment
  • Flexible work hours and remote working days
